page.title: 09EMPLOYMENT III
page.content: From our survey the following was found:- skilled 26% unskilled 8% retired 28% unemployed 28% By no means was this an exhaustive survey it does nevertheless show several points about the local employment situation.These are :- 1. The high level of unemployment in the area with the decline of local traditional industries without replacement. 2. The large number of senior citizens formerly employed in these industries . 3. The large proportion of skilled workers possibly a result of the traditional Scottish idea of "Getting a trade" to insure future prospects.
